Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class InitController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.InitController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class InitController extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Class InitController is used for initialize the game and all its components

  • Constructor Details

    • InitController

      public InitController(int numPlayers, boolean isExpertGame)
      Construct a InitController that will initialize the game by number of player and rules for the game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players of the game
      isExpertGame - boolean value for rules of the game

    • InitController

      public InitController(Game gameRestored)
      Construct a InitController that will initialize a restored game with value stored in a json file created every time a player make a move
      Parameters:
      gameRestored - game restored with value contained in json file

    • setupPlayerTower

      public void setupPlayerTower(Player player, TowerType tower) throws TowerTypeAlreadyTakenException
      Sets a tower type to a player if the type isn't already taken
      Parameters:
      player - player to set the tower type
      tower - type of the tower to set
      Throws:
      TowerTypeAlreadyTakenException - if the type of tower chosen is already taken by another player

      Parameters:
      player - player to set the wizard
      wizard - type of wizard to set
      Throws:
      WizardTypeAlreadyTakenException - if the type of wizard chosen is already taken by another player
